title: UNCLE ACID & THE DEADBEATS Announces North American Tour At All Seated Venues
description: Prepare for the cinematic majesty that is Nell' Ora Blu.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
excerpt: Prepare for the cinematic majesty that is Nell' Ora Blu.
text: Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats will hit the road across North America next February in support of their new record Nell' Ora Blu. Given that the is a tribute to the bloody Italian Giallo film scene of the '70s, Uncle Acid's entire tour will be at seated venues where they'll presumably have a ton of visuals. The tour features ex-Tribulation guitarist Jonathan Hultén as the opener. Tickets are available here. 2/5 Silver Spring, MD The Fillmore2/6 New York, NY The Town Hall2/7 Somerville, MA Somerville Theater2/8 Montreal, QC MTelus2/9 Toronto, ON Danforth Music Hall2/11 Detroit, MI Masonic Cathedral Theatre2/12 Chicago, IL Thalia Hall2/13 St. Paul, MN Fitzgerald Theater2/15 Boulder, CO Boulder Theater2/18 Seattle, WA Neptune Theatre2/19 Portland, OR Revolution Hall2/21 San Francisco, CA The Regency Ballroom2/22 Los Angeles, CA Palace Theatre Want More Metal? html:
Uncle Acid & The Deadbeats will hit the road across North America next February in support of their new record Nell' Ora Blu. Given that the is a tribute to the bloody Italian Giallo film scene of the '70s, Uncle Acid's entire tour will be at seated venues where they'll presumably have a ton of visuals.

The tour features ex-Tribulation guitarist Jonathan Hultén as the opener. Tickets are available here.

2/5 Silver Spring, MD The Fillmore
2/6 New York, NY The Town Hall
2/7 Somerville, MA Somerville Theater
2/8 Montreal, QC MTelus
2/9 Toronto, ON Danforth Music Hall
